room_title: Escape room "Omega Hour" by Twisted Limits Escape Rooms in Chicago
review: We had a great experience in the Omega Hour room. Truly a fun and challenging escape. This was only our 2nd escape adventure, but we were thrilled to pull off another win (with less than 2 minutes left on the clock, on this one). Excited to be the 100th group through this escape room and the 24th to conquer it.

room_title: Escape room "Omega Hour" by Twisted Limits Escape Rooms in Chicago
review: Had a great time here! Super friendly staff, a challenging but not frustrating game, and cool game room and snacks to enjoy while you wait for your time. We will definitely be back to try the other room!

room_title: Escape room "Omega Hour" by Twisted Limits Escape Rooms in Chicago
review: We had a great time and are looking forward to coming back!
